text:
Created attachment 25021
Patch for the pom.xml

The impl/pom.xml in trunk contains invalid <resources> information that causes a jar file to be created with duplicate classes with bad package names.
creator: jgawor@gmail.com
bayard@apache.org
text:
Thanks Jarek.

svn ci -m "Applying Jarek Gower's patch from Bugzilla issue 48772; removing the unnecessary (and duplication creating) resources section" pom.xml 
Sending        pom.xml
